t: Peruvian Amazon Company - Wikipedia
s: April 4, 2025 - The Peruvian Amazon Company, also known as the Anglo-Peruvian Amazon Rubber Co., was a rubber boom company that operated in Peru during the late 1800s and early 1900s.
